subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Montel's show.
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
Well, I got the thing that said they got the e-mail. With Coast to Coast 
next month, and Montel's show, that's way beyond "my comfort zone" for 
public exposure. Just thinking about the possibilities gives me the bang 
shang-alang heart beat! There's a reason I stay in my basement and work on 
stuff, I don't like going out in public, I don't even like to talk on the 
phone!

Frank
